title: Tong Ling Fei 2nd Season
synopsis:
Qian Yunxi, the eldest daughter of the prime minister of Guyu Kingdom, has supernatural powers. She has been considered an unlucky person since she was a child and is forced to marry into the Ye Palace. Seeing her sincerity and kindness, the prince Ye Youming uses thousands of tricks to show his kindness. Qian Yunxi thinks that the prince has bad intentions, so she fights with him. A chaotic cohabitation life begins.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
